A list of words relating to different forms of theatre, including play genres, artistic styles etc.Includes links to more in-depth information about Immersive Theatre, Pantomime, Performance Art and Spectacle.

Words include: Agitprop, Brechtian, Burlesque, Dinner Theatre, Documentary Theatre, End On, Epic Theatre, Expressionism, Farce, Forum Theatre, Futurism, Grand Guignol, In the Round, Installation, Legitimate Theatre, Melodrama, Metatheatre, Mime, Miracle Play, Music Hall, Mystery Play, Naturlaism, Opera, Pantomime, Performance Art, Physical Theatre, Promenade, Revue, Sinakulo, Site-Specific Theatre, Songsheet, Spectacle etc.,

Keywords; Types of plays, types play genres, genres plays, types play genres, forms of theatre, thetrical forms, different theatre forms, different theatrical forms, different forms of theatres what is theatrical forms
